"Announcer": "This is soo yummy! It's delicious, Big sis!"
"Okay, okay, I get it! Don't talk while you eat. You got stuff on your mouth. Here, stop moving so I can wipe it."
"Hi-Hitsugi! I also got stuff on my mouth! R-right here!"
"Yeah, sure... Here you go."
"You know... from lunch reservations to making orders, this world is almost becoming too convenient."

"Why don't you get one too? It's really handy, Hitsugi.
You can use this for many things besides games.
I can't live without it."
"I'd rather be inside my room playing PC games where I don't have to deal with other people around."
"We've come this far with technology, so we might as well use it. Not like it's that easy to go back at this point anyway. I mean, look at it! Technology's come so far!"
"Especially this app made by YMT Corporation! It only came out recently, but it's so convenient!"
"The brilliant mind behind the dining and outfit coordination decisions is none other than the great YMT Corporation!"
"What's more, the CEO is an alumni from our very same high school!"
"That's quite the obscure fact, Kohri. You their biggest fan or something?"
"Hitsugi, you are SO past the times! This topic is totally trending right now!"
"Look over there! You see? Just like the rumors said, the president recently arranged a local interview right in this very square!!"

"We are currently in front of the headquarters for the YMT Corporation,
where we will, in a few minutes, receive the privilege
of touring this landmark establishment."

"We're here today for an exclusive interview and tour from the heartthrob
of our generation and CEO of YMT Corp, President Hagith Anie!
Mr. Anie, thank you for taking time out of your busy schedule to be here!"
"The pleasure is mine."

"As president, it was your decision to choose the name \"YMT\", correct?
If I might be so bold as to ask, what does it stand for?
Perhaps an abbreviation?"
"Well, what do you think it's short for?"
"Uh... YMT, huh? Seems like it could combine \"year\" and \"multiple\" for something that lasts \"multiple years\"!"
"Not even close, my friend. The correct answer is Ya Ma To."
"Ya Ma To??"

"In Japanese, \"yamato\" can refer to the soul.
As a proud Japanese citizen, I know this well."

"Above all else, we named it in respect to the famous battleship,
the battleship Yamato. Hence, it is \"YMT\",
an appealing abbreviated form."

"The battleship Yamato, you say?
I wondered why I saw a model of a battleship inside the company building!"

"Loathe as I am to admit,
that model is not of the Yamato herself, but rather her sister ship; the Musashi.
She was commissioned in 1942, not one year following her elder sister."
"Eh, really?"

"Well, I don't blame you for mistaking them.
To the average man today, they are merely two ships of the same class."
"I...see."

"But while the honor to Musashi lives here within the Corporation HQ, the Yamato
is enshrined within my very soul. I also have a rather decorated shrine towards it at home.
Would you care to see it sometime?"

"I-I'm afraid I've already got plans.
But thank you for the...kind offer."
"Really? What a shame."

"Oh, look here, good sir! This model was formerly adopted in the late 2000's.
Type 10. Such a beauty... do you not agree?"
"In recent years, people don't hear so much about different models and types. Such a shame, really!"

"I'm quite the fan of the weapons used in the Old War era,
but that's not to say I don't have appreciation for the modern versions.
They regail such a rich history of the evolution of man, do they not?"
"See, look here. Look carefully at the elegant design..."
"...Otaku."
"...Definitely an otaku."
"What's an otaku?"
"Someone like Kohri."
"That's meeeaaannn, Hitsugiii!!"

"Aru, an Otaku is a person who becomes
a little too obsessed."
"Oh. So what's Kohri obsessed with?"
"You walked right into that one."
"An \"otaku\", huh? Hey, <%me>... Is there anything that you'd consider yourself obsessed with?"
"1. I'm obsessed with ARKS Missions."
"2. I'm obsessed with you, Xiera."
"3. Nothing in particular."

"And not a doubt I had! You're pretty much the ARKS role model!
Bunch of those newbies could really learn a lesson or two from you.
Skipping missions and sloppy reports... They have guts!"
"H-hehe, thank you! I know it's just flattery, but I'm soo happy!"
"But wait wait wait, no. You shouldn't say that so casually, okay?"
"Eh? Nothing? Really? I mean, it doesn't need to be an obsession, per se. Just something you're really into!"
"I know you're one of our best people, but it's good to settle down and have some time to relax as well, right?"
"As for myself, I'm obsessed with being everyone's administrator! Simply put, an administrator Otaku! ...Eh? Not the same?"
"Anyway, it's amazing to have many things that you can be obsessed about!"
